main_definition: Meals refer to the food consumed at specific times during the day, usually breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Breakfast (the first meal of the day)
meanings_and_examples.example: I always start my day with a healthy bowl of oatmeal for breakfast.
We have an hour-long lunch break at work where we usually eat sandwiches and salads.
On special occasions, my family likes to cook a big dinner with multiple courses.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An organized event where food is served
meanings_and_examples.example: We attended a friend's housewarming party and had a great time during the meal and conversation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of dishes or courses eaten at one sitting
meanings_and_examples.example: For her birthday, she enjoyed a three-course meal including appetizers, main course, and dessert.
